Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility finding, procedural fairness, adequacy of interpretation
Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility finding based on inconsistencies in applicant's story
Legal_Provision: Section 96 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in narrative, lack of weight given to supporting documents
Application_Error: Failure to raise translation concerns during hearing
Review_Outcome: No question certified, no costs awarded
Evidence_Ignored: Alleged ignored evidence not substantiated; minor translation errors noted but not deemed significant
Application_Factor: Interpreter performance, timeliness of raising issues
Decision_Review_Issue: Unreasonable credibility findings, ignored evidence, procedural unfairness due to interpreter errors
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Rule that court will not reweigh evidence if decision is reasonable; procedural fairness requires adequate but not perfect translation
Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credibility, perceived inconsistencies, insufficient evidence
Evidentiary_Issues: Minor translation errors, lack of contemporaneous documentation
Procedural_Fairness: No denial found despite minor interpreter errors; applicant failed to object during hearing
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenged reasonableness of decision and procedural fairness
Procedural_Issue: Failure to raise interpreter issues during proceeding
Omission_Type: Failure to object to translation in real time
